description: These dessert pots combine creamy textures with tang and sweetness.
name: Passionfruit Posset Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium passionfruit, seed and flesh only, mashed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan to a medium heat with the cream, vanilla and sugar and stir while cooking for 5 minutes.
Once the sugar has melted, remove from the heat and allow to cool slightly.
Now combine the rest of the ingredients and mix together fully.
Pour the mixture into 4 serving glasses and allow to set in the fridge for a minimum of 1 hour before serving.
